div.p: Being a Fire Fighter it’s more of a community role nowadays it’s not just going in fighting fires, we basically do anything the Police and Ambulance
don’t do so we also go to road traffic accidents, environmental agency cleanups, we also do Fire Safe visits as well so we visit your house and
give you basically the whole premise at the moment is prevention so we’ll go into your house and give you fire safety advice, how to be safer
in the house so it’s a whole lot of that as well. There’s a lot of responsibility in the way you carry yourself as well, so carrying yourself in high regard
and you know trying to lead by example so even to try and be a better person as well in the job and out of the job.
